yaak.sim.schedule
Interface Scheduler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionScheduler
public interface Scheduler

Scheduler prescribes basic scheduling services.

Version:
$Id: Scheduler.java 6 2005-06-08 17:00:15Z jsmith $
Author:
Jerry Smith

Method Summary
 void addAction(Action action, long tick)
          Adds the action (or actions, in the case of an ActionGroup) for execution at the specified tick.
 void pause()
          Pauses the scheduler following the current tick.
 Action removeAction(long tick)
          Removes the action (or actions, in the case of an ActionGroup) for execution at the specified tick.
 void restart()
          Restarts the scheduler.
 void resume()
          Resumes the scheduler at the next tick following a pause.
 void start()
          Starts the scheduler.
 void stop()
          Stops the scheduler.
 

Method Detail

addAction

public void addAction(Action action,
                      long tick)

Adds the action (or actions, in the case of an ActionGroup) for execution at the specified tick. Note: Adding an action replaces any existing action at that tick. To add multiple actions at a specific tick, encapsulate them in an action group and add the group.

Parameters:
action - The action or action group.
tick - The scheduler's tick.

removeAction

public Action removeAction(long tick)

Removes the action (or actions, in the case of an ActionGroup) for execution at the specified tick.

Parameters:
tick - The scheduler's tick.

start

public void start()

Starts the scheduler.

restart

public void restart()

Restarts the scheduler.

stop

public void stop()

Stops the scheduler.

resume

public void resume()

Resumes the scheduler at the next tick following a pause.

pause

public void pause()

Pauses the scheduler following the current tick.
